alert.note: Alert for Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:52PM CDT until June 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL JUNEAU AND WEST CENTRAL ADAMS COUNTIES... At 451 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located 7 miles northeast of Mauston, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Friendship and Adams around 505 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Highway 13 And County E, White Creek, Castle Rock, The Town Of Quincy and Castle Rock Dam. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
